patterns.description: M7739 View B is a girls lined dress with a full gathered skirt, strap ruffle detail and back ties. Suitable for kid friendly cotton fabrics.
M7980 View A is a semi fitted, western style button up shirt for men and women. View A features a yoke, collar, collar band and patch pockets with buttoned flaps.
M7987 View C is a men’s pant with tapered leg and fly front with hook and bar closure. View C also features side slant pockets and back patch pockets.

M7791 View A is a sleeveless, close-fitting knit dress with elasticized waist and faux wrap bodice with band and circle style skirt. Suitable for moderate knit fabric, this is a dress you can wear every day.

M7791 View B is a long sleeve, close-fitting knit dress with elasticized waist and faux wrap bodice with band and above the knee pencil skirt. Suitable for moderate knit fabric, this is a dress you can wear every day.
Mid-Neck Princess Dress is a fitted woven dress with A-line silhouette with princess seam details and square neckline.
Women’s 12 Pant is a semi-fitted, tapered leg pant for woven fabric with a natural waistline and decorative waistband.
Boat Neck Jumpsuit is a sleeveless woven jumpsuit with princess seam bodice, boat neckline and keyhole closure in the back.
Knit Surplice Empire Dress is a fitted knit dress with full length A-line skirt, empire waist seam, wrap style neckline and short flutter sleeve.
Knit Tunic Short Sleeve is a fitted knit tunic-length top with short fitted sleeves, décolleté neckline and decorative curved hemline.
Z New Splicing Multidirection dress test
